response.job_title: Client Support Engineer (Tier II)  @ Blackboard | Linux, Python, SQL, Technical Support
response.summary:
As an Electronics Engineer with a degree in Electronic Engineering from Universidad Nacional de Colombia, I have developed a strong foundation in circuit design, industrial control, and telecommunications. I also completed a semester abroad at Leibniz Universität Hannover, where I enhanced my skills in German language and culture.

Currently, I work as a Client Support Engineer - Tier II at Blackboard, a leading provider of educational technology solutions. In this role, I provide second-level technical support to US- and Latin-American clients, troubleshoot issues in SaaS environments, manage tickets, document bugs, and communicate with stakeholders. I have demonstrated proficiency in Linux and Windows operating systems, SQL database administration, and ticketing platforms, as well as excellent customer service and teamwork skills.

I am passionate about bridging cultures and facilitating effective communication in a globalized world. Fluent in Spanish, English, and German, I am eager to further my professional journey in Germany and explore opportunities to work with diverse and innovative teams. Let's connect and see how we can collaborate and learn from each other.
response.skills: Customer Service, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Trabajo en equipo, Windows, Documentación técnica, Sistema de seguimiento de errores, Pruebas manuales, Implementación de KPI, Satisfacción del cliente, Resolución de incidencias, Inglés, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería, Alemán, Adaptación, Linux, SQL, Technical Communication

profile_positions.description: Provided second-level technical support to US- and Latin-American clients with the aim of isolating bugs, determining possible workarounds, and completing related documentation; by complying with Service Level Agreement and established KPIs.
profile_positions.title: Client Support Engineer - Tier II

profile_positions.description: Provided technical support to system administrators via phone and tickets-system of a wide range of Blackboard products that include the mobile application, reporting systems and the LMS.
profile_positions.title: Client Support Specialist - Tier I

profile_positions.description: Provided 1st level technical support to CSG’s postproduction products by troubleshooting, escalating and managing incidents of telecommunication systems while meeting SLA requirements and ensuring customer satisfaction through constant communication. Also, worked with Linux and Windows operational systems and in server remote accessing / system management through SSH protocol.
profile_positions.title: Product Support Analyst I - Level 1

profile_positions.description: Proyecto "Estudio de interferencia electromagnética en la banda de radiodifusión sonora producida por sistemas de medición avanzada en energía eléctrica "en el grupo de investigación de compatibilidad electromagnética EMC-UN.
profile_positions.title: Asistente de investigación

education.field_of_study: Control industrial y diseño de circuitos digitales

company.name: Blackboard
company.description: As part of the Anthology ecosystem, Blackboard Learn is designed to help students and educators achieve their goals through dynamic, data-informed experiences. Blackboard Learn by Anthology helps students and faculty connect and engage to drive better outcomes and support learner success.
